symptoms: Aching or swelling in the joints
Altered sense of taste or smell
Feeling of incomplete emptying after bowel movements
Feeling of pressure in the chest

diets.name: Mediterranean Diet
diets.details: The Mediterranean Diet emphasizes whole foods like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins (fish, poultry, legumes), and healthy fats (olive oil). It limits red meat, processed foods, and refined sugars.

diets.name: Keto Diet
diets.details: The Keto Diet is high in fats, low in carbs, and moderate in proteins. It aims to put the body into a state of ketosis, where it burns fat for energy. It restricts foods high in carbohydrates.

diets.name: Vegetarian Diet
diets.details: The Vegetarian Diet excludes meat but includes plant-based foods like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, legumes, nuts, and seeds. There are variations, including lacto-vegetarian and ovo-vegetarian.

diets.name: Vegan Diet
diets.details: The Vegan Diet excludes all animal products, including meat, dairy, and eggs. It focuses on plant-based foods and may require careful planning to ensure nutritional needs are met.

diets.name: Paleo Diet
diets.details: The Paleo Diet mimics the presumed diet of our ancient ancestors. It includes lean meats, fish, fruits, vegetables, nuts, and seeds while excluding grains, legumes, dairy, and processed foods.

diets.name: DASH Diet
diets.details: The DASH (Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension) Diet aims to lower blood pressure. It emphasizes fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and low-fat dairy while reducing sodium intake.

diets.name: Intermittent Fasting
diets.details: Intermittent Fasting involves alternating between periods of eating and fasting. There are different fasting patterns, such as the 16/8 method (16 hours fasting, 8 hours eating) or 5:2 (eating normally 5 days, restricted calories 2 days).

diets.name: Gluten-Free Diet
diets.details: The Gluten-Free Diet excludes gluten, a protein found in wheat, barley, and rye. It is necessary for individuals with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity but may require careful label reading.

diets.name: Low-FODMAP Diet
diets.details: The Low-FODMAP Diet is used to manage irritable bowel syndrome (IBS). It restricts certain fermentable carbohydrates (FODMAPs) that can trigger digestive symptoms in some individuals.

diets.name: DASH Diet
diets.details: The DASH (Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension) Diet aims to lower blood pressure. It emphasizes fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and low-fat dairy while reducing sodium intake.

articles.title: Understanding Diabetes
articles.details: This article explores the causes, symptoms, and management of diabetes. It covers type 1 and type 2 diabetes, blood sugar monitoring, and lifestyle changes.

articles.title: Managing Anxiety: Tips for a Healthier Mind
articles.details: Learn about the different types of anxiety disorders, their symptoms, and effective coping strategies. This article provides insights into therapy options and relaxation techniques.

articles.title: Heart Health: The Importance of Exercise
articles.details: Discover the benefits of regular exercise on heart health. This article explains how physical activity can reduce the risk of heart disease, improve circulation, and strengthen the heart.

articles.title: Nutrition Essentials: Building a Balanced Diet
articles.details: Learn about the key components of a balanced diet and their role in maintaining overall health. This article provides tips for choosing nutrient-rich foods and creating healthy eating habits.

articles.title: Coping with Allergies: Tips for Relief
articles.details: Get insights into common allergies, their symptoms, and strategies for managing allergic reactions. This article covers allergy testing, allergen avoidance, and medication options.

articles.title: Understanding Depression: Signs and Support
articles.details: Explore the signs and symptoms of depression, as well as available treatment options. This article emphasizes the importance of seeking help and offers guidance for supporting loved ones.

articles.title: Benefits of Sleep: Prioritizing Your Rest
articles.details: Learn about the importance of quality sleep for physical and mental well-being. This article provides tips for improving sleep hygiene and establishing healthy sleep patterns.

articles.title: A Guide to Healthy Aging
articles.details: Discover tips for maintaining vitality and well-being as you age. This article covers exercise, nutrition, cognitive health, and social engagement for a fulfilling senior life.

articles.title: Managing Chronic Pain: Strategies for Relief
articles.details: Explore various approaches to managing chronic pain, including medications, therapies, and lifestyle adjustments. This article offers insights into pain management techniques.

articles.title: Healthy Habits for Strong Immunity
articles.details: Learn how to strengthen your immune system through lifestyle choices. This article discusses the impact of diet, exercise, sleep, and stress management on immune function.

drugs.name: Prednisone
drugs.side_effects: Weight gain, mood changes, high blood pressure

drugs.name: Warfarin
drugs.side_effects: Bleeding risk, interactions with other drugs

lab_tests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
lab_tests.details: Measures levels of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets. Used to assess overall health and detect various conditions.

lab_tests.name: Blood Glucose Test
lab_tests.details: Measures the level of glucose (sugar) in the blood. Used to diagnose and monitor diabetes.
lab_tests.purpose: Diagnose diabetes, monitor blood sugar levels.

lab_tests.name: Lipid Profile
lab_tests.details: Measures levels of cholesterol, triglycerides, and lipoproteins. Assess cardiovascular risk.
lab_tests.purpose: Evaluate heart health, assess lipid abnormalities.

lab_tests.name: Thyroid Function Tests
lab_tests.details: Includes TSH, T3, and T4 tests to assess thyroid gland function.
lab_tests.purpose: Diagnose thyroid disorders, monitor thyroid function.

lab_tests.name: Liver Function Tests (LFTs)
lab_tests.details: Measures enzymes and proteins produced by the liver. Evaluates liver health and function.
lab_tests.purpose: Diagnose liver diseases, monitor liver function.

lab_tests.name: Kidney Function Tests
lab_tests.details: Includes tests like creatinine and blood urea nitrogen (BUN). Evaluates kidney function.
lab_tests.purpose: Detect kidney disorders, monitor kidney function.

lab_tests.name: Electrolyte Panel
lab_tests.details: Measures levels of sodium, potassium, and chloride. Assesses electrolyte balance.

lab_tests.name: Coagulation Panel
lab_tests.details: Includes tests like PT, INR, and PTT to assess blood clotting function.
lab_tests.purpose: Monitor anticoagulant therapy, assess bleeding disorders.

lab_tests.name: C-Reactive Protein (CRP)
lab_tests.details: Measures inflammation in the body. Used to assess risk of heart disease and other conditions.

lab_tests.name: Hemoglobin A1c
lab_tests.details: Measures average blood sugar levels over the past 2-3 months. Used to monitor diabetes control.
lab_tests.purpose: Monitor long-term glucose control in diabetes.

lab_tests.name: Urinalysis
lab_tests.details: Analyzes urine for signs of infection, kidney disease, and other conditions.
lab_tests.purpose: Detect urinary tract infections, assess kidney function.

lab_tests.name: Vitamin D Test
lab_tests.details: Measures the level of vitamin D in the blood. Assesses bone health and overall well-being.
lab_tests.purpose: Evaluate vitamin D deficiency, monitor bone health.

lab_tests.name: Rheumatoid Factor (RF)
lab_tests.details: Detects the presence of rheumatoid factor antibodies. Used to diagnose rheumatoid arthritis.

lab_tests.name: HIV Test
lab_tests.details: Detects the presence of HIV antibodies or antigens. Used to diagnose HIV infection.
lab_tests.normal_range: Negative result: No presence of HIV antibodies or antigens.

lab_tests.name: Hepatitis Panel
lab_tests.details: Includes tests for hepatitis A, B, and C viruses. Diagnoses and monitors hepatitis infections.

lab_tests.name: Stool Occult Blood Test
lab_tests.details: Detects hidden blood in stool samples. Used for early detection of gastrointestinal bleeding.
lab_tests.normal_range: Negative result: No presence of blood.

lab_tests.name: PSA Test
lab_tests.details: Measures prostate-specific antigen levels in the blood. Used for prostate cancer screening.
lab_tests.normal_range: Varies by age and risk factors.

lab_tests.name: Lung Function Tests
lab_tests.details: Includes tests like spirometry to assess lung function and diagnose lung diseases.
lab_tests.purpose: Diagnose lung diseases like asthma, COPD.

lab_tests.name: Allergy Blood Tests
lab_tests.details: Measures specific IgE antibodies to identify allergen sensitivities.

illnesses.name: Common Cold
illnesses.symptoms: Runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, coughing, mild fever.
illnesses.treatment: Rest, stay hydrated, over-the-counter cold remedies.
illnesses.protection: Frequent handwashing, avoiding close contact with sick individuals.

illnesses.name: Influenza (Flu)
illnesses.symptoms: Fever, chills, cough, muscle aches, fatigue, headache.
illnesses.treatment: Rest, antiviral medications (if prescribed by a doctor).
illnesses.protection: Annual flu vaccination, good hygiene practices.

illnesses.name: COVID-19
illnesses.symptoms: Fever, cough, shortness of breath, loss of taste or smell.
illnesses.treatment: Seek medical advice, supportive care.
illnesses.protection: Vaccination, wearing masks, social distancing, hand hygiene.

illnesses.name: Diabetes
illnesses.symptoms: Increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, blurry vision.
illnesses.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medication (insulin or oral), monitoring blood sugar.
illnesses.protection: Maintain a healthy lifestyle, regular check-ups, manage weight.

illnesses.name: Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
illnesses.symptoms: Often no symptoms, but can lead to serious health issues.
illnesses.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medication, blood pressure monitoring.
illnesses.protection: Healthy diet, exercise, limit salt intake, regular check-ups.

illnesses.name: Asthma
illnesses.symptoms: Shortness of breath, wheezing, coughing, chest tightness.
illnesses.treatment: Inhaled bronchodilators, corticosteroids, avoiding triggers.
illnesses.protection: Avoiding triggers (smoke, allergens), having an asthma action plan.

illnesses.name: Heart Disease
illnesses.symptoms: Chest pain, shortness of breath, fatigue, irregular heartbeat.
illnesses.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medication, surgery (if needed).
illnesses.protection: Healthy diet, regular exercise, no smoking, stress management.

illnesses.name: Stroke
illnesses.symptoms: Sudden numbness, confusion, trouble speaking, severe headache.
illnesses.treatment: Emergency medical attention, clot-dissolving drugs (if applicable).
illnesses.protection: Control blood pressure, maintain a healthy lifestyle.

illnesses.name: Depression
illnesses.symptoms: Persistent sadness, loss of interest, fatigue, changes in appetite.
illnesses.treatment: Psychotherapy, medication, support groups.
illnesses.protection: Seek help early, talk to a mental health professional.

illnesses.name: Anxiety
illnesses.symptoms: Excessive worry, restlessness, panic attacks, trouble sleeping.
illnesses.treatment: Therapy, medication, relaxation techniques.
illnesses.protection: Manage stress, practice relaxation, seek professional help if needed.

illnesses.name: Obesity
illnesses.symptoms: Excessive body weight, increased risk of other health issues.
illnesses.treatment: Dietary changes, exercise, behavior modification.
illnesses.protection: Maintain a healthy weight, balanced diet, regular physical activity.

illnesses.name: Arthritis
illnesses.symptoms: Joint pain, swelling, stiffness, decreased range of motion.
illnesses.treatment: Pain relievers, physical therapy, lifestyle changes.
illnesses.protection: Regular exercise, joint protection, maintaining a healthy weight.

illnesses.name: Alzheimer's Disease
illnesses.symptoms: Memory loss, confusion, mood changes, difficulty performing tasks.
illnesses.treatment: No cure, but management of symptoms, support for caregivers.
illnesses.protection: Stay mentally and socially active, healthy lifestyle.

illnesses.name: Cancer
illnesses.symptoms: Varies based on cancer type, may include unexplained weight loss, fatigue, pain.
illnesses.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation, targeted therapies.
illnesses.protection: Healthy lifestyle, early detection screenings, avoid known carcinogens.

illnesses.name: HIV/AIDS
illnesses.symptoms: Initial flu-like symptoms, followed by a period with few or no symptoms.
illnesses.treatment: Antiretroviral therapy (ART), managing associated health issues.
illnesses.protection: Safe sex practices, avoid sharing needles, get tested regularly.

illnesses.name: Osteoporosis
illnesses.symptoms: Often no symptoms until a fracture occurs.
illnesses.treatment: Calcium and vitamin D, medication, fall prevention.
illnesses.protection: Healthy diet, weight-bearing exercises, avoid smoking, limit alcohol.

illnesses.name: Pneumonia
illnesses.symptoms: Fever, chills, cough, shortness of breath, chest pain.
illnesses.treatment: Antibiotics, rest, fluids.
illnesses.protection: Pneumococcal vaccination, good hygiene, avoid close contact with sick individuals.

illnesses.name: Gastroenteritis (Stomach Flu)
illnesses.symptoms: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, stomach cramps.
illnesses.treatment: Fluid replacement, rest, avoiding certain foods.
illnesses.protection: Good hygiene, avoid contaminated food and water, handwashing.

illnesses.name: Epilepsy
illnesses.symptoms: Seizures, loss of consciousness, unusual sensations.
illnesses.treatment: Medication, lifestyle adjustments, surgery (in some cases).
illnesses.protection: Take medication as prescribed, seizure safety precautions.

illnesses.name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
illnesses.symptoms: Cough, shortness of breath, wheezing, chest tightness.
illnesses.treatment: Bronchodilators, steroids, oxygen therapy.
illnesses.protection: Avoid smoking, limit exposure to pollutants, manage symptoms.

illnesses.name: Liver Disease
illnesses.symptoms: Fatigue, weight loss, jaundice, abdominal pain.
illnesses.treatment: Depends on the underlying cause, lifestyle changes.
illnesses.protection: Limit alcohol intake, avoid high-risk behaviors, get vaccinated for hepatitis.

illnesses.name: Kidney Disease
illnesses.symptoms: Fatigue, swelling, changes in urination, nausea, high blood pressure.
illnesses.treatment: Medication, dialysis, kidney transplant (in severe cases).
illnesses.protection: Control blood pressure, manage diabetes, stay hydrated.

illnesses.name: Allergies
illnesses.symptoms: Sneezing, runny nose, itchy/watery eyes, skin rash.
illnesses.treatment: Avoid allergens, antihistamines, allergy shots.
illnesses.protection: Identify triggers, allergy-proof home, keep windows closed during pollen season.

illnesses.name: Migraine
illnesses.symptoms: Severe headache, often one-sided, nausea, sensitivity to light/sound.
illnesses.treatment: Pain relievers, lifestyle changes, preventive medications.
illnesses.protection: Identify triggers, manage stress, maintain a consistent routine.

illnesses.name: Sleep Apnea
illnesses.symptoms: Loud snoring, pauses in breathing during sleep, daytime sleepiness.
illnesses.treatment: Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP), lifestyle changes.
illnesses.protection: Maintain a healthy weight, avoid alcohol and sedatives before bedtime.

illnesses.name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
illnesses.symptoms: Joint pain, swelling, stiffness, fatigue, loss of joint function.
illnesses.treatment: Medication, physical therapy, lifestyle changes.
illnesses.protection: Early diagnosis, regular check-ups, manage inflammation.

illnesses.name: Autoimmune Disorders
illnesses.symptoms: Varies based on disorder, may include fatigue, joint pain, rashes.
illnesses.treatment: Depends on the specific disorder, medication, lifestyle changes.
illnesses.protection: Understand risk factors, manage stress, follow treatment plans.

surgeries.name: Appendectomy
surgeries.details: A surgical removal of the appendix, often due to appendicitis, an inflamed appendix.
surgeries.complications: Infection, bleeding, injury to nearby organs.

surgeries.name: Cholecystectomy
surgeries.details: Surgical removal of the gallbladder, often due to gallstones causing pain or inflammation.
surgeries.complications: Bile leakage, infection, injury to bile ducts.

surgeries.name: Hernia Repair
surgeries.details: Restoring a hernia back into its proper place and strengthening the abdominal wall.
surgeries.uses: Repair inguinal, umbilical, or hiatal hernias.

surgeries.name: Cataract Surgery
surgeries.details: Removing the cloudy lens of the eye and replacing it with an artificial lens.

surgeries.name: Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG)
surgeries.details: Creating new pathways for blood flow to the heart by using blood vessels from other parts of the body.

surgeries.name: Knee Replacement
surgeries.details: Replacing a damaged knee joint with an artificial joint.
surgeries.uses: Treat severe knee arthritis or injury.

surgeries.name: Hip Replacement
surgeries.details: Replacing a damaged hip joint with an artificial joint.
surgeries.uses: Treat severe hip arthritis or injury.

surgeries.name: Lumbar Discectomy
surgeries.details: Removing part of a herniated disc to relieve pressure on spinal nerves.
surgeries.uses: Treat herniated lumbar disc causing pain and numbness.
surgeries.complications: Nerve injury, infection, recurrent disc herniation.

surgeries.name: Thyroidectomy
surgeries.details: Surgical removal of all or part of the thyroid gland.

surgeries.name: Mastectomy
surgeries.details: Surgical removal of one or both breasts.
surgeries.uses: Treat breast cancer or reduce cancer risk.

surgeries.name: Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass
surgeries.details: Reducing the size of the stomach and rerouting the small intestine to promote weight loss.

surgeries.name: Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
surgeries.details: Minimally invasive removal of the gallbladder.
surgeries.complications: Bile leakage, infection, injury to bile ducts.

surgeries.name: Lung Resection
surgeries.details: Surgical removal of part or all of a lung.

surgeries.name: Spinal Fusion
surgeries.details: Joining two or more vertebrae together to stabilize the spine.

surgeries.name: Gallbladder Removal
surgeries.complications: Bile leakage, infection, injury to bile ducts.

surgeries.name: Prostatectomy
surgeries.details: Surgical removal of all or part of the prostate gland.

surgeries.name: Colon Resection
surgeries.details: Surgical removal of part of the colon.

surgeries.name: Tracheostomy
surgeries.details: Creating an opening in the neck to insert a breathing tube into the trachea.
